alert.note: Alert for San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 12 at 9:54PM MST until February 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, Southwest Mountains, West Central Highlands, and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow is possible Monday evening and early Tuesday morning. Blowing snow and reduced visibilities are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
